mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.no AS "no", a.site AS "site", a.opname AS "opname", a.opcode AS "opcode", a.num AS "num", a.complete AS "complete", a.qrcode AS "qrcode", a.pid AS "pid.id"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_baogong_order_mingxi( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, no, site, opname, opcode, num, complete, qrcode, pid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{no}, #{site}, #{opname}, #{opcode}, #{num}, #{complete}, #{qrcode}, #{pid.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_baogong_order_mingxi SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, no = #{no}, site = #{site}, opname = #{opname}, opcode = #{opcode}, num = #{num}, complete = #{complete}, qrcode = #{qrcode}, pid = #{pid.id} WHERE id = #{id}
